description:
Tierno`s Squirtle is Tierno`s starter Pokémon given to him by Professor Sycamore. It was first seen in the anime battling against a Roubushin which it showed off its dance moves and jumping power.
During the first day of the Pokémon Summer Camp, it was matched up in a battle against Ash`s Froakie in a Water against Water battle. Its dodging rhythm made it too hard to hit and it ended up defeating Ash`s Froakie.
name: Zenigame (Tierno)
